headline: CEO, Co-Founder
multiline_icebreaker: Hey Robert — went down a rabbit hole on Reality’s site. The way you use that 63-second Brand Overview Video to articulate problem/solution and blue ocean potential for a Series B raise caught my eye. Your focus on technology-driven storytelling that translates complex engineering into clear customer value stuck with me.

headline: Chief Executive Officer & Founder
multiline_icebreaker: Hey Meg — went down a rabbit hole on Merge's site. The part about pairing Fractional CMO leadership with full-funnel lead gen and automation caught my eye. Your focus on measurable, ROI-driven outcomes stuck with me.

headline: Founder and CEO
multiline_icebreaker: Hey Roxanne — went down a rabbit hole on Alaniz's site. The part about using Account Based Marketing to coordinate sales and marketing caught my eye. Your focus on strategy-first planning really stuck with me.

headline: Founder & CEO
multiline_icebreaker: Hey Richard — went down a rabbit hole on HERO's site. The “Take Me To Your Leaders” section, framing HERO as caring, honest, and leading by example, caught my eye. Your focus on building long-term, referral-driven client partnerships stuck with me.
